Description:
Detects the use of "vim" and it's siblings commands to execute a shell or proxy commands.
Such behavior may be associated with privilege escalation, unauthorized command execution, or to break out from restricted environments.


Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Vim GTFOBin Abuse - Linux
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%:!/%' or command like '%:lua %' or command like '%:py %' or command like '%/bin/bash%' or command like '%/bin/dash%' or command like '%/bin/fish%' or command like '%/bin/sh%' or command like '%/bin/zsh%') and ((process_path like '%/rvim' or process_path like '%/vim' or process_path like '%/vimdiff') and (command like '% --cmd%' or command like '% -c %')))
